short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide the draw and resign buttons on Chess.com daily games when in analysis mode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a softer solution to the (slightly more draconian) "Never Surrender" extension for Chess.com Daily games.

Tired of accidentally resigning your Chess.com Daily games while clicking through move history, but aren't comfortable removing the option entirely? This extension hides the draw and resign buttons for Daily games when in Analysis mode. It also moves the resign/draw confirmation box to the top of the screen.

Sometimes give up. Sometimes surrender.
